xwikidoc.content:
TODO: Update Types list.
INTRO TEXT:
Need link to page for detailed help on contribute (FAQ page)
First Box:
DIRECTION LINE: This is where you will choose a file to upload, or enter a web site link. (Button: More info)
DATA ENTRY FIELD INSTRUCTION Is this a Web Site (URL)? Is this a file on your computer? (Separate Radio buttons, "File" is default) Yes/No
(Browse button- Greys out or disappears if yes button selected) Use this button to find your file.
Second Box- The Asset Type list should be:
DIRECTION LINE: Choose the type of file or web resource you are contributing. 1. = "Archive: Web Site" 1. = "Archive: .Zip/Stuffit File" 1. = "Document: .Doc, .XLS, PDF?" 1. = "Media: Animation/Activity" 1. = "Media: Audio/Video" 1. = "Image: GIF, JPG, PNG, BMP?" 1. = "Other?"
